metadata.Title: CVE-2022-3341 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: A null pointer dereference issue was discovered in 'FFmpeg' indecode_main_header() function of libavformat/nutdec.c file. The flaw occursbecause the function lacks check of the return value ofavformat_new_stream() and triggers the null pointer dereference error,causing an application to crash.

criterions.comment: ffmpeg: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
